Oscar Rodríguez Rocha

Research Engineer

Ph.D. in Computer and Control Engineering


I’m currently the head of Data Science & AI at Teach on Mars . I’m mainly interested in AI in education, concretely on:

  • Knowledge Representation and Reasoning
  • Semantic Web and Linked Data
  • Machine Learning - Graph Representation Learning (GRL)
  • Recommender Systems

I’m an external collaborator of WIMMICS, a joint research team between Inria Sophia-Antipolis Sophia Antipolis - Méditerranée and I3S (CNRS and Université Côte d’Azur), where I worked for almost 5 years doing research on AI in education. I also worked previously as a postdoc researcher at the Politecnico di Torino in Italy for the SoftEng research group and I hold a PhD in Information and Systems Engineering obtained also from the Politecnico di Torino.
